name: URL, no schema  Hostname only
description: This RegEx matches only a FQDN or Fully Qualified Domain name. HTTP, FTP, Etc.. are no captured and the whole check fails if they are included
content:
google.com
me.x.com
x.y.zc
https://x.y.zc
http://x.y.zc
www.x.y.zc
google.com.jm
warez.tk/
author: Jerome Allen
